view

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsView, Game2048View, MazeGameView

    public interface View
    The Interface View - passive interface that displays data (the model) and routes user commands (events) to the presenter to act upon that data.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void connected(java.lang.Boolean flag)
      Connected - notify the gui that a connection was established
      void displayBoard(int[][] data)
      Display board - This method draws the GUI based on given data.
      void displayScore(int score)
      Display score.
      common.UserCommand getUserCommand()
      Gets the user command.
      void killThread()
      Kill thread - kill a running game thread (used for switching games)
      void setLose()
      Sets the lose.
      void setWin()
      Sets the win.

    • Method Detail

      • displayBoard

        void displayBoard(int[][] data)
        Display board - This method draws the GUI based on given data. The presenter will use this method whenever the data has changed and the GUI needs to be re-drawn.
        Parameters:
        data - the data
